context.title: Home Items
body: In the bathroom, there is a bathtub and a sink. The toilet is next to the sink. There is toilet paper on the holder.
On the towel rack, there are clean towels. A toothbrush and toothpaste are on the counter. The bath mat is soft and nice.
In the bedroom, there is a double bed with a blanket and pillows. The duvet is warm. There is a bedside table with a lamp.
In the living room, there is a TV on the stand. The remote control is on the side table. There are cushions on the sofa.
In the kitchen, there is a kitchen sink and a countertop. A cutting board is next to the frying pan. There are mugs and glasses in the cupboard.
